definition: a datum about some physical state that is presented to a user by a meter or similar instrument
details:
noun
- a datum about some physical state that is presented to a user by a meter or similar instrument
= synonyms: reading
- something (as a course of action) that is indicated as expedient or necessary
= example: something (as a course of action) that is indicated as expedient or necessary
- something that serves to indicate or suggest
= example: something that serves to indicate or suggest
= synonyms: indicant
- (medicine) a reason to prescribe a drug or perform a procedure
= example: (medicine) a reason to prescribe a drug or perform a procedure
- the act of indicating or pointing out by name
= synonyms: denotation
